text: I want to look fun and festive and be in the spirit of the Derby with all of the fabulous outfits and hats that are there,
but I also need to strike a professional balance that looks like I'm there on the job.
Not too over the top, but still having fun. And so when I selected a hat for the Derby,
I selected something that was very straightforward but fun,
had a nice style to it but monochrome so it could go with different outfits if I chose...
...to wear it year after year to the Derby, and so kind of a multipurpose hat that's the equivalent...
...of a black cocktail dress in your closet, that can go with a variety of things...
...and fit any occasion whether dressed up or dressed down.
